Faults.message: We’re very sorry for the power cut today. Storm Ciaran is bringing strong winds and heavy rain to the south coast and that is causing damage to our network and an increase in power cuts. We will be dispatching engineers as soon as it’s safe to do so. In the meantime, our control centre is working hard to remotely try and get power back on for as many customers as possible. You can keep track of the latest updates here on Power Track and we’ll also text you with updates if you’ve chosen to receive these. If you have any questions, our team is on hand 24 hours a day to help, so feel free to send us a message below or call us on 105.
